00021            const uint NodeDoF);

00027     ~GaugeModel() {
00028       set<GaugeLipid *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00029       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00030     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00031     
00032       for (set<GaugeLipid *>::iterator it = UNIQUEmaterials.begin();
00033        it != UNIQUEmaterials.end(); it++) 
00034         delete (*it);
00035     };
00036

00038 
00040     // From constant value
00041     void initializeField(const Real value = 1.0) {
00042       const uint numNodes = _myMesh->getNumberOfNodes();
00043       const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00044       if (_nodeDoF == dim ){
00045     //Case: Only displacement DOF
00046     for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) 
00047       for (uint j = 0; j < dim; j++){
00048         double value1 = 1+1e-3*(double(rand())/double(RAND_MAX));
00049         _field[i*dim+j] = _myMesh->getX(i,j)*value1; // value = isotropic expansion/shrinking
00050       }
00051       }
00052       else if (_nodeDoF == 1){
00053     // Case: Only scalar field DOF
00054     for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) 
00055       _field[i] = 0; 
00056       }
00057       else if (_nodeDoF == 4){
00058     // Case: Displacement and scalar DOFs
00059     for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++){ 
00060       for (uint j = 0; j < dim; j++){
00061         _field[i*(dim+1)+j] = _myMesh->getX(i,j)*value; // value = isotropic expansion/shrinking      
00062       }
00063       _field[i*(dim+1)+dim] = 0;
00064     }
00065       }
00066       else{
00067     cout << "Unknown initalization for _field"<<endl;
00068     exit(-1);
00069       }
00070     };
00071 
00073     void initializeField(const Real* value) {
00074       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00075     };
00076 
00077 
00078 
00080     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, Real fact) {
00081       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getNumberOfNodes())*_nodeDoF;
00082       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00083     _field[i] += fact*localValues[i];
00084     };
00085 
00086     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00087     void linearizedUpdate(const int id, const int dof, const Real value) {
00088       const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00089       // assert( id < _field.size() && dof < dim );
00090       _field[id*dim + dof] += value;
00091     }
00092 
00093     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00094     void linearizedUpdate(const int dof, const Real value) {
00095       _field[dof] += value;
00096     }
00097     
00098     void setField(uint dof, Real value) {
00099       _field[dof] = value;
00100     }
00101     void setField(const Real* value) {
00102       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());

00105     void getField(vector<double> & x) {
00106       assert(x.size() == _field.size());
00107       x = _field;

00114     void printField() {
00115       // Assume dim = 3 - need to be changed
00116       int i = 0;
00117       while (i < _field.size()) {
00118     for (uint j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00119       cout << _field[i] << " ";
00120       i++;
00121     }
00122     cout << endl;
00123       }
00124     }

00126     void writeField(string FileName) {
00127       ofstream out;
00128       out.open( FileName.c_str() );
00129       out << _field.size() << endl;
00130       for (uint i = 0; i < _field.size(); i++) {
00131     out << setprecision(15) << _field[i] << endl;
00132       }
00133       out.close();
00134     }

00136     uint getNumMat() {
00137       set<GaugeLipid *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00138       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00139     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00140     
00141       return UNIQUEmaterials.size();
00142     }

00144     uint getTotNumMatProp() {
00145       set<GaugeLipid *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00146       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00147     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00148     
00149       return ( UNIQUEmaterials.size() * (_materials[0]->getMaterialParameters()).size() );
00150     }
